entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Daniel's Harbour 05:30 AM NST Tuesday 03 January 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -5.8°C
Wind: WNW 15 km/h

entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near noon then mainly cloudy. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning near midnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 8 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 8 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 18 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Windy. Low minus 14. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Tuesday 03 January 2023
